Description:
Detects the use of KrbRelay, a Kerberos relaying tool

Author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: HackTool - KrbRelay Execution
Query: sourcetype='windows-sysmon' eql select * from _source_ where ((command like '%shadowcred%' and command like '%clsid%' and command like '%spn%') or (command like '%spn %' and command like '%session %' and command like '%clsid %') or (process_path like '%\krbrelay.exe' and original_file_name = 'krbrelay.exe') or (command like '% -spn %' and command like '% -clsid %' and command like '% -rbcd %'))
